sentences.sContent: How much does it cost per kilo?
My car does 12 miles per litre (= for each litre of petrol ) .
sentences.sCn: 我的汽车每升汽油跑12英里。

sentences.sContent: The meal cost $25 per head (= for or by each person ) .
...The report warns that 200 million poor workers are at risk of joining the ranks of people living on less than 2 dollars per day in the past three years...

...small schools-most of them with about 400 kids each with an average enrollment of only 150 per grade...

...milk or 100% fruit juices haven’t had the intended effect of steering kids away from drinking sugared drinks: the average teen consumes about 300 calories per day — that’s nearly 15% of his daily calories — in sweetened drinks...
...Houses built before 1939 use about 50% more energy per square foot than those built after 2000...
